mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WD_WEDDING(WHSEQ, CID, CNAME, HTYPE, MINCOOK, MAXCOOK, MENUTYPE, MINPEOPLE, MAXPEOPLE, CONTENT, ADDRESS, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, PICTURE, TRANSPO, PARKING, READCOUNT, COMMENTCOUNT) VALUES(SEQ_WEDDING.NEXTVAL, #{cid}, #{cname}, #{htype}, #{mincook}, #{maxcook}, #{menutype}, #{minpeople}, #{maxpeople}, #{content}, #{address}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{picture}, #{transpo}, #{parking}, 0, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT WHSEQ, CID, CNAME, HTYPE, MINCOOK, MAXCOOK, MENUTYPE, MINPEOPLE, MAXPEOPLE, CONTENT, ADDRESS, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, PICTURE, TRANSPO, PARKING, READCOUNT, COMMENTCOUNT FROM WD_WEDDING ORDER BY WHSEQ DESC

SELECT WHSEQ, CID, CNAME, HTYPE, MINCOOK, MAXCOOK, MENUTYPE, MINPEOPLE, MAXPEOPLE, CONTENT, ADDRESS, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, PICTURE, TRANSPO, PARKING, READCOUNT, COMMENTCOUNT FROM WD_WEDDING WHERE WHSEQ=#{whseq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WD_WHALL(PDSEQ, WHSEQ, HALLNAME, FLOOR, MINCOOK, MAXCOOK, FORMAT, FACILITY, MINPEOPLE, MAXPEOPLE, SETPEOPLE, WSTEP, PAY, MENUTYPE, DRINK, OPENTIME, CLOSETIME) VALUES(SEQ_WH_PDSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{whseq}, #{hallname}, #{floor}, #{mincook}, #{maxcook}, #{format}, #{facility}, #{minpeople}, #{maxpeople}, #{setpeople}, #{wstep}, #{pay}, #{menutype}, #{drink}, #{opentime}, #{closetime})
mapper.select: SELECT PDSEQ, WHSEQ, HALLNAME, FLOOR, MINCOOK, MAXCOOK, FORMAT, FACILITY, MINPEOPLE, MAXPEOPLE, SETPEOPLE, WSTEP, PAY, MENUTYPE, DRINK, OPENTIME, CLOSETIME FROM WD_WHALL WHERE WHSEQ=#{whseq} ORDER BY PDSEQ DESC

SELECT PDSEQ, WHSEQ, HALLNAME, FLOOR, MINCOOK, MAXCOOK, FORMAT, FACILITY, MINPEOPLE, MAXPEOPLE, SETPEOPLE, WSTEP, PAY, MENUTYPE, DRINK, OPENTIME, CLOSETIME FROM WD_WHALL WHERE WHSEQ=#{whseq} AND HALLNAME=#{hallname}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WD_HALL_PICTURE(PICSEQ, WHSEQ, HALLNAME, PICTURE) VALUES(SEQ_WHPIC.NEXTVAL, #{whseq}, #{hallname}, #{picture})
mapper.select: SELECT HALLNAME, COUNT(WHSEQ) AS SUMPIC FROM WD_HALL_PICTURE WHERE WHSEQ = #{whseq} GROUP BY HALLNAME
SELECT PICSEQ, WHSEQ, HALLNAME, PICTURE FROM WD_HALL_PICTURE WHERE WHSEQ = #{whseq} ORDER BY PICSEQ
SELECT SUM(WHSEQ) AS PICTOTAL FROM WD_HALL_PICTURE WHERE WHSEQ = #{whseq} GROUP BY WHSEQ
SELECT PICSEQ, WHSEQ, HALLNAME, PICTURE FROM WD_HALL_PICTURE WHERE WHSEQ = #{whseq} AND HALLNAME=#{hallname} ORDER BY PICSEQ ASC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM WD_HALL_PICTURE WHERE WHSEQ = #{whseq} AND HALLNAME=#{hallname}
